00050   void setchannellist()
00051   {
00052     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < channel_index.size(); i++){
00053       chanlist[i] = CR_PACK(channel_index[i], range_id, aref);
00054     }
00055   }

00058   void print(std::ostream &stream)
00059   {
00060     stream<<"comedi version code: "<<comedi_get_version_code(dev)<<std::endl;
00061     stream<<"device file: "<<filename<<std::endl; 
00062     stream<<"driver name: "<<comedi_get_driver_name(dev)<<std::endl;
00063     stream<<"board name: "<<comedi_get_board_name(dev)<<std::endl;
00064     stream<<"subdevice id: " << subdevice << "\n";
00065     int type = comedi_get_subdevice_type(dev, subdevice);
00066     stream<<"subdevice type: ";
00067     switch(type)
00068       {
00069       case 0: stream<<"unused"<<std::endl; break;
00070       case 1: stream<<"analog input"<<std::endl; break;
00071       case 2: stream<<"analog output"<<std::endl; break;
00072       }
00073     stream<<"number of channels: "<<channel_index.size()<<std::endl;
00074     stream<<"channels: ";
00075     for(unsigned int i=0; i<channel_index.size(); i++){
00076       stream<<chanlist[i]<<" ";
00077     }
00078     stream<<std::endl;
00079     stream<<"analog reference id: "<<aref<<std::endl;
00080     std::cerr<<"analog reference: ";
00081     switch(aref)
00082       {
00083       case AREF_GROUND: std::cerr<<"AREF_GROUND"<<std::endl;break;
00084       case AREF_COMMON: std::cerr<<"AREF_COMMON"<<std::endl;break;
00085       case AREF_DIFF: std::cerr<<"AREF_DIFF"<<std::endl;break;
00086       case AREF_OTHER: std::cerr<<"AREF_OTHER"<<std::endl;break;
00087       }
00088     show_range(stream);
00089     //stream<<"convert binary to voltage: "<<physical<<std::endl;
00090     stream<<"number of samples: "<<sample_number<<std::endl;
00091     stream<<"sampling rate: "<<sampling_rate<<" Hz"<<std::endl;
00092 
00093     // dump command
00094     if(verbose)
00095       {
00096         std::cout<<"start_arg: "<< cmd->start_arg <<std::endl;
00097         std::cout<<"scan_begin_arg: "<< cmd->scan_begin_arg <<std::endl;
00098         std::cout<<"convert_arg: "<< cmd->convert_arg <<std::endl;
00099         std::cout<<"scan_end_arg: "<< cmd->scan_end_arg <<std::endl;
00100         std::cout<<"stop_arg: "<< cmd->stop_arg <<std::endl;
00101       }
00102   }

00111   int show_range(std::ostream &stream)
00112   {
00114     stream<<"range=["<<comedirange->min<<".."<<comedirange->max<<"] (";
00116     std::string unit_name;
00117     switch(comedirange->unit)
00118       {
00119       case UNIT_volt:
00120         unit_name="volts";
00121         break;
00122       case UNIT_mA:
00123         unit_name="milliamps";
00124         break;
00125       case UNIT_none:
00126       default:
00127         unit_name="none";
00128         break;
00129       }//switch unit
00130     stream<<unit_name<<")\n";
00131     return 0;
00132   }

00141   int load_parameter(const std::string file_name)
00142   {
00143 
00144     //NetCDF/CDL parameter file object (i.e. parameter class)
00145     CParameterNetCDF fp;
00147     int error=fp.loadFile((char *)file_name.c_str());
00148     if(error){std::cerr<<"loadFile return "<< error <<std::endl;return error;}
00150     //prepare to load parameters as the attribute of "acquisition"
00152     float process;
00153     std::string process_name="acquisition";
00154     if((error=fp.loadVar(process,&process_name))){std::cerr<<"Error: process variable \""<<process_name<<"\" can not be loaded (return value is "<<error<<")\n";return error;}
00156     // load parameters as process attributes
00158     fp.loadAttribute("channels",channel_index);
00159     fp.loadAttribute("channel_name",channel_name);
00160     fp.loadAttribute("sampling_rate",sampling_rate);
00161     fp.loadAttribute("number_of_samples",sample_number);
00162     fp.loadAttribute("range_id",range_id);
00163 
00164     setchannellist();
00165 
00166     return 0;
00167   }

00171 
00174   int prepare_cmd()
00175   { 
00176     unsigned period_nanosec=(unsigned)(1e9/sampling_rate);
00177 
00178     memset(cmd,0,sizeof(*cmd));
00179 
00180     cmd->subdev = subdevice;
00181     cmd->flags = 0;
00182 
00186     cmd->start_src = TRIG_NOW;
00187     cmd->start_arg = 0;
00188 
00189     // set the board sampling rate (see comedi website)
00190     cmd->scan_begin_src = TRIG_TIMER;
00191     cmd->scan_begin_arg = period_nanosec;
00192 
00193     // set waiting time for A/D convertion to be minimum
00194     // this should be corrected in command test
00195     cmd->convert_src = TRIG_TIMER;
00196     cmd->convert_arg = 1;
00197 
00198     // set number of channels
00199     cmd->scan_end_src = TRIG_COUNT;
00200     cmd->scan_end_arg   = channel_index.size();
00201 
00202     // set number of scans
00203     cmd->stop_src = TRIG_COUNT;
00204     cmd->stop_arg = sample_number;
00205 
00206     // set channel list
00207     cmd->chanlist           = chanlist;
00208     cmd->chanlist_len = channel_index.size();
00209 
00210     return 0;
00211   }

00220   int config_device_common()
00221   {
00222     int sdflag;                 
00223     
00224     // load thee device file
00225     dev = comedi_open(filename.c_str());
00226     if(!(dev)){
00227       comedi_perror(filename.c_str());
00228       exit(1);
00229     }
00230     // check subdevice flag before using it
00231     sdflag = comedi_get_subdevice_flags(dev, subdevice);
00232     std::cout<<std::showbase;
00233     if (verbose) std::cout<<"subdevice flag: "<<std::hex<<sdflag<<std::dec<<std::endl;
00234 
00235 // get max data and range. these will be used to convert 16bit integer binary to physical voltage
00236     maxdata = comedi_get_maxdata(dev, subdevice,channel_index.front());
00237     comedirange = comedi_get_range(dev, subdevice,channel_index.front(),range_id);
00238     if(verbose) std::cout<<"maxdata:"<<maxdata<<", min:"<<(comedirange)->min<<", max:"<<(comedirange)->max<<", unit:"<<(comedirange)->unit<<std::endl;
00239 
00240     return 0;
00241   }//config_device_common
00242 
00243 
00244   int config_device_point()
00245   {
00246     return config_device_common();
00247   }//config_device_point
00248 
00249   int config_device_specific_buffer(void *&map)
00250   {
00251 
00252     int ret;
00253 
00254     // get the buffer size of the subdevice 
00255     bufsize = comedi_get_buffer_size(dev, subdevice);
00256     if(verbose) std::cout<<"buffer size is "<<bufsize<<std::endl; 
00257 
00258     // map device buffer to main memory through device file /dev/comedi0
00259     // option MAP_SHARED means updating memory contents when the file (/dev/comedi0) is updated.
00260     // (this means buffer and memory are linked??)
00261     // mmap(*addr, size, prot, flags, fd, offset) is the system function.
00262     map = mmap(NULL, bufsize, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, comedi_fileno(dev), 0);
00263     if( verbose ) std::cout<<"pointer to mapped region: "<<std::hex<<map<<std::dec<<std::endl;
00264     if( map == MAP_FAILED ){
00265       perror( "mmap" );
00266       exit(1);
00267     }
00268     // this function should be called twice.
00269     ret = comedi_command_test(dev, cmd);
00270     ret = comedi_command_test(dev, cmd);
00271     if(ret != 0){
00272       fprintf(stderr,"command_test failed\n");
00273       exit(1);
00274     }
00275 
00276     // check actual sampling frequency is the same as the user specified
00277     int actual_freq=1e9/cmd->scan_begin_arg;
00278     if(sampling_rate != actual_freq)
00279       {    
00280         std::cerr<<"please check the sampling rate."<<std::endl;
00281         std::cerr<<"user specified sampling freq: "<<sampling_rate<<" Hz"<<std::endl;
00282         std::cerr<<"        actual sampling freq: "<<actual_freq<<" Hz"<<std::endl;
00283         exit(1);
00284       }
00285 
00286     // send the command to the board
00287     ret = comedi_command(dev, cmd);
00288     if(ret < 0)
00289     {
00290       comedi_perror("comedi_command");
00291       exit(1);
00292     }
00293 
00294     return 0;
00295   }//config_device_specific_buffer
00296 
00297   int config_device_buffer(void *&map)
00298   {
00299     int ret;
00300     prepare_cmd(); // prepare command to the board;
00301     if((ret=config_device_common())!=0) return ret;
00302     return config_device_specific_buffer(map);
00303    }//config_device_buffer

00336 template <typename Tacquisition, typename Tphysical>
00337   int convert_to_phys(cimg_library::CImgList<Tacquisition>& data, cimg_library::CImgList<Tphysical>& data_phys, DAQdevice DAQdev)
00338 {
00339   data_phys.assign(data);
00340   cimglist_for(data,c)
00341     {
00342       cimg_forX(data[c],s)
00343         {
00344           data_phys[c](s)=comedi_to_phys(data[c](s), DAQdev.comedirange, DAQdev.maxdata);
00345         }
00346     }
00347   return 0;
00348 }
00350 
00359 template <typename Tacquisition, typename Tphysical>
00360   int convert_from_phys(cimg_library::CImgList<Tphysical>& data_phys, cimg_library::CImgList<Tacquisition>& data, DAQdevice DAQdev, const bool assign=true)
00361 {
00362   if(assign) data.assign(data_phys);
00363   cimglist_for(data_phys,c)
00364     {
00365       cimg_forX(data_phys[c],s)
00366         {
00367           data[c](s)=comedi_from_phys(data_phys[c](s), DAQdev.comedirange, DAQdev.maxdata);
00368         }
00369     }
00370   return 0;
00371 }

00385 template <typename Tdata, typename Ttime>
00386   int create_time(cimg_library::CImgList<Tdata>& data, cimg_library::CImgList<Ttime>& time, DAQdevice DAQdev)
00387 {
00388   //get minimum convert time of the board
00389   int min_convert_time=DAQdev.cmd->convert_arg; // in nano second
00390 
00391   //std::cerr<<__FILE__<<"/"<<__func__<<"(...)\n"<<std::flush;
00392   //data.print("data");
00393   //PR(board_frequency);
00394   //PR(sampling_rate);
00395   //allocate time structure
00396   time.assign(data);
00397   //time.print("time");
00398   double cdelay=1e-9*(double)min_convert_time;//delay between channels
00399   double present_time=0.0;
00400   cimg_forX(time[0],s)
00401     {
00402       cimglist_for(time,c)
00403         {
00404           time[c](s)=present_time+cdelay*c; // time of a channel is delayed depending on c
00405         }
00406       present_time+=1/(double)DAQdev.sampling_rate;
00407     }
00408   return 0;
00409 }
00410 
00412 char *cmd_src(int src,char *buf)
00413 {
00414   buf[0]=0;
00415   if(src&TRIG_NONE)strcat(buf,"none|");
00416   if(src&TRIG_NOW)strcat(buf,"now|");
00417   if(src&TRIG_FOLLOW)strcat(buf, "follow|");
00418   if(src&TRIG_TIME)strcat(buf, "time|");
00419   if(src&TRIG_TIMER)strcat(buf, "timer|");
00420   if(src&TRIG_COUNT)strcat(buf, "count|");
00421   if(src&TRIG_EXT)strcat(buf, "ext|");
00422   if(src&TRIG_INT)strcat(buf, "int|");
00423 #ifdef TRIG_OTHER
00424   if(src&TRIG_OTHER)strcat(buf, "other|");
00425 #endif
00426   if(strlen(buf)==0){
00427     sprintf(buf,"unknown(0x%08x)",src);
00428   }else{
00429     buf[strlen(buf)-1]=0;
00430   }
00431   return buf;
00432 }
00433 
00434 
00435 char *tobinary(char *s,int bits,int n)
00436 {
00437   int bit=1<<n;
00438   char *t=s;
00439 
00440   for(;bit;bit>>=1)
00441     *t++=(bits&bit)?'1':'0';
00442   *t=0;
00443 
00444   return s;
00445 }

00447 void probe_max_1chan(comedi_t *it,int s)
00448 {
00449   comedi_cmd cmd;
00450   char buf[100];
00451 
00452   printf("  command fast 1chan:\n");
00453   if(comedi_get_cmd_generic_timed(it, s, &cmd, 1, 1)<0){
00454     printf("    not supported\n");
00455   }else{
00456     printf("    start: %s %d\n",
00457            cmd_src(cmd.start_src,buf),cmd.start_arg);
00458     printf("    scan_begin: %s %d\n",
00459            cmd_src(cmd.scan_begin_src,buf),cmd.scan_begin_arg);
00460     printf("    convert: %s %d\n",
00461            cmd_src(cmd.convert_src,buf),cmd.convert_arg);
00462     printf("    scan_end: %s %d\n",
00463            cmd_src(cmd.scan_end_src,buf),cmd.scan_end_arg);
00464     printf("    stop: %s %d\n",
00465            cmd_src(cmd.stop_src,buf),cmd.stop_arg);
00466   }
00467 }
00468 
00469 void get_command_stuff(comedi_t *it,int s)
00470 {
00471   comedi_cmd cmd;
00472   char buf[100];
00473 
00474   if(comedi_get_cmd_src_mask(it,s,&cmd)<0){
00475     printf("    not supported\n");
00476   }else{
00477     printf("    start: %s\n",cmd_src(cmd.start_src,buf));
00478     printf("    scan_begin: %s\n",cmd_src(cmd.scan_begin_src,buf));
00479     printf("    convert: %s\n",cmd_src(cmd.convert_src,buf));
00480     printf("    scan_end: %s\n",cmd_src(cmd.scan_end_src,buf));
00481     printf("    stop: %s\n",cmd_src(cmd.stop_src,buf));
00482 
00483     probe_max_1chan(it,s);
00484   }
00485 }

00487 int get_board_info(std::string fd, bool verbose)
00488 {
00489 
00490   std::vector<std::string> subdevice_types;
00491   subdevice_types.push_back("unused");
00492   subdevice_types.push_back("analog input");
00493   subdevice_types.push_back("analog output");
00494   subdevice_types.push_back("digital input");
00495   subdevice_types.push_back("digital output");
00496   subdevice_types.push_back("digital I/O");
00497   subdevice_types.push_back("counter");
00498   subdevice_types.push_back("timer");
00499   subdevice_types.push_back("memory");
00500   subdevice_types.push_back("calibration");
00501   subdevice_types.push_back("processor");
00502   subdevice_types.push_back("serial digital I/O");
00503 
00504   comedi_t *it;
00505   int i,j;
00506   int n_subdevices, type;
00507   int chan, n_chans;
00508   int n_ranges;
00509   int subdev_flags;
00510   comedi_range *rng;
00511   comedi_cmd cmd;
00512 
00513   it=comedi_open((char*)fd.c_str());
00514   std::cout<<"version code: "<<comedi_get_version_code(it)<<std::endl;
00515   std::cout<<"device file: "<<fd<<std::endl; 
00516   std::cout<<"driver name: "<<comedi_get_driver_name(it)<<std::endl;
00517   std::cout<<"board name: "<<comedi_get_board_name(it)<<std::endl;
00518 
00519   comedi_get_cmd_generic_timed(it, 0, &cmd, 1, 1); // assuming analog input is channel 0
00520   int min_convert_time=cmd.convert_arg;
00521 
00522   if(verbose)
00523     {
00524       n_subdevices=comedi_get_n_subdevices(it);
00525       std::cout<<"number of subdevices: "<<n_subdevices<<std::endl;
00526       for(i = 0; i < n_subdevices; i++){
00527         printf("subdevice %d:\n",i);
00528         type = comedi_get_subdevice_type(it, i);
00529         std::cout<<" type:"<<type<<subdevice_types[type]<<std::endl;
00530         if(type==COMEDI_SUBD_UNUSED)
00531           return 0;
00532         subdev_flags = comedi_get_subdevice_flags(it, i);
00533         printf("  flags: 0x%08x\n",subdev_flags);
00534         n_chans=comedi_get_n_channels(it,i);
00535         printf("  number of channels: %d\n",n_chans);
00536         if(!comedi_maxdata_is_chan_specific(it,i)){
00537           printf("  max data value: %lu\n", (unsigned long)comedi_get_maxdata(it,i,0));
00538         }else{
00539           printf("  max data value: (channel specific)\n");
00540           for(chan=0;chan<n_chans;chan++){
00541             printf("    chan%d: %lu\n",chan,
00542                    (unsigned long)comedi_get_maxdata(it,i,chan));
00543           }
00544         }
00545         printf("  ranges:\n");
00546         if(!comedi_range_is_chan_specific(it,i)){
00547           n_ranges=comedi_get_n_ranges(it,i,0);
00548           printf("    all chans:");
00549           for(j=0;j<n_ranges;j++){
00550             rng=comedi_get_range(it,i,0,j);
00551             printf(" [%g,%g]",rng->min,rng->max);
00552           }
00553           printf("\n");
00554         }else{
00555           for(chan=0;chan<n_chans;chan++){
00556             n_ranges=comedi_get_n_ranges(it,i,chan);
00557             printf("    chan%d:",chan);
00558             for(j=0;j<n_ranges;j++){
00559               rng=comedi_get_range(it,i,chan,j);
00560               printf(" [%g,%g]",rng->min,rng->max);
00561             }
00562             printf("\n");
00563           }
00564         }
00565         printf("  command:\n");
00566         get_command_stuff(it,i);
00567 
00568       }
00569     }//verbose
00570   return min_convert_time;
00571 }
